name: WP Social Importer
author: Daniele Favi

sections.description:
WP Social Importer is a wordpress plugin that imports news from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter into your website. This plugin transforms automatically the news from your social networks into wordpress posts.

The content of the news will automatically be processed: links, hash-tags and people you mention in the news will be converted into real links. The main picture of your news will be set as a featured image on the wordpress post.

You can also set the categories, tags and post-type you want to associate with the posts you are importing.

You can find a detailed tutorial for the set up here https://www.danielefavi.com/wp-social-importer/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder wp-social-importer and its content to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Go to the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress and activate the WP Social Importer plugin
  3. You can find a detailed tutorial for the set up at https://www.danielefavi.com/wp-social-importer/
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the folder wp-social-importer and its content to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Go to the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress and activate the WP Social Importer plugin
  3. You can find a detailed tutorial for the set up at https://www.danielefavi.com/wp-social-importer/

short_description: WP Social Importer is a wordpress plugin that imports news from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter.
description:

The content of the news will automatically be processed: links, hash-tags and people you mention in the news will be converted into real links. The main picture of your news will be set as a featured image on the wordpress post.

You can also set the categories, tags and post-type you want to associate with the posts you are importing.

You can find a detailed tutorial for the set up here https://www.danielefavi.com/wp-social-importer/
